topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553d57d96368727126560c00#post_553d57d96368727126560c00
Basically two boys were crying. Going on about how they wanted to be "Grown-up." I explained to them if they wanted to be treated like adults they'd have to act like. And crying like they were made them children. Then I explained to them that there is nothing wrong with being a kid. Then they calmed down and then I woke up.

It was super weird.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553d58ca63687248bba50900#post_553d58ca63687248bba50900
So you told them to not be kids, but it's okay if they are?

"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553d59df636872684e931c00#post_553d59df636872684e931c00
I just told them what they needed to hear to calm down. Again, this was a weird dream.
